title: Stylish and Brand-New Apartment Resort in Surfers Paradise - Perfect for Couples & Families
description: Experience a Gold Coast resort like no other with a stay at the brand-new The Ruby Apartments, located just a two-minute walk from Surfers Paradise beach. Luxe apartment living meets all the amenities of a first-class resort, with modern, self-contained units, an array of on-site dining destinations, a 21-metre splash pool with shallow entry and a huge range of activities for all ages - from cocktail making and wine and cheese tasting for the adults, to cupcake decorating, teddybear workshops and a waterpark for younger guests. Included in your escape is a daily continental buffet breakfast, AUD$100 resort credit, one nightly cocktail each, undercover parking for one vehicle and more.
offer_address: 9 Norfolk Ave, Surfers Paradise QLD 4217

title: Family-Friendly Gold Coast Apartment Stay Close to Surfers Paradise Beach
description:
Find everything you need for an easy family break right in the heart of Surfers Paradise. These self-contained apartments give you space to stretch out and settle in, with full kitchens, laundry facilities and roomy living areas. Positioned above the Chevron Renaissance precinct, you’ll be just steps from casual eateries, supermarkets and everyday essentials, with Surfers Paradise beach a short walk away.

There's plenty to fill the days between beach outings and sightseeing - the sprawling 'Beaches in the Sky' area boasts a huge lagoon pool fringed by palms and shaded lawns. Indoor and outdoor lap pools, a gym and a sauna mean there's always something to do, while the on-site theatre beckons quiet nights in.
location_description: Mantra Towers of Chevron Surfers Paradise
offer_address: 23 Ferny Ave, Surfers Paradise QLD 4217, Australia

title: Stylish Novotel Surfers Paradise Escape with Daily Breakfast, Room Upgrade & Daily Drinks
description:
Experience the epitome of Gold Coast sophistication and take in impressive views from all angles at Novotel Surfers Paradise. This high-rise hotel puts the sand and sunshine on your doorstep, with the famed sandy stretches just metres away, and the lively atmosphere of Cavill Avenue within easy reach. Exceptional facilities, including a gleaming pool, jet-powered spa and tennis courts are sure to impress, and the newly refurbished Deluxe Rooms ensure blissful relaxation with a stylish twist. To round out your day, fire up the BBQ facilities for a family-friendly feast or enjoy the ambience of The Restaurant or BLVD Café & Bar for a well-deserved drink or delicious bite to eat.

Whether you want to get up close to adventure at the nearby theme parks just a short drive away, lounge on the shores of the Gold Coast’s most iconic beachfront or get lost among 400 retail stores at Pacific Fair, this contemporary hotel is a relaxing retreat where you can unwind after exciting days of discovery.
offer_address: 3105 Surfers Paradise Boulevard, Surfers Paradise, Queensland 4217, Australia

vendor_name: Q1 Resort and Spa Gold Coast
title: Iconic Q1 Resort & Spa Escape in the Heart of the Gold Coast
description: Experience the glamorous Gold Coast with an iconic, award-winning getaway at the AAA-rated Q1 Resort & Spa. Tower over popular Surfers Paradise, staying in a sleek One-Bedroom Spa Apartment, sleeping up to four adults. Travelling with friends and family? Two-Bedroom Spa Apartments (sleeping up to six) are also available. An apartment on the tenth floor or higher is guaranteed, promising spectacular hinterland and canal views, with Ocean-View Upgrades available. Enjoy premium sparkling wine and chocolates on arrival, SkyPoint Observation Deck access for two with one drink each at the SkyPoint Bistro and Bar, two AU$25 spa vouchers and more.
offer_address: 9 Hamilton Ave, Surfers Paradise QLD 4217

title: Ocean-View Surfers Paradise Escape with Daily Breakfast & Drinks
description:
Experience the epitome of Gold Coast relaxation and sophistication with some of the best views on the coast at Novotel Surfers Paradise. This high-rise hotel puts the sand and sunshine on your doorstep, with the golden stretch of Surfers Paradise Beach just metres away and the vibrant nightlife of Caville Avenue within minutes. Make memories to last a lifetime with a guaranteed upgrade to a newly refurbished Deluxe Ocean-View Room, meaning you'll wake up to one of the most iconic sights in the Gold Coast.

Your sun-soaked escape includes daily breakfast, one daily glass of house wine, beer or soft drink per person, a cheese platter to share and leisurely 12pm checkout.

**Travelling with family?** Choose a Deluxe Ocean-View Twin Room with two double beds. Two children (aged 11 years and under) stay free with daily breakfast and complimentary meals when dining with a paying adult.
offer_address: 3105 Surfers Paradise Boulevard, Surfers Paradise, Queensland 4217, Australia

title: Family-Friendly Surfers Paradise Apartment Stay with Unlimited Dreamworld Entry & SkyPoint Access
description:
Find everything you need for an easy family break right in the heart of Surfers Paradise. These self-contained apartments give you space to stretch out and settle in, with full kitchens, laundry facilities and roomy living areas. Positioned above the Chevron Renaissance precinct, you’ll be just steps from casual eateries, supermarkets and everyday essentials, with Surfers Paradise Beach a short walk away.

Your package also includes entry to two of the Gold Coast’s best-loved attractions! Spend the day riding rollercoasters and meeting Australian wildlife at Dreamworld, then take in panoramic coastal views from the SkyPoint Observation Deck, perched high above Surfers Paradise in one of the city’s most recognisable towers.

There's plenty to fill the days between thrilling outings and sightseeing - the sprawling 'Beaches in the Sky' area boasts a huge lagoon pool fringed by palms and shaded lawns. Indoor and outdoor lap pools, a gym and a sauna mean there's always something to do, while the on-site theatre beckons quiet nights in.
location_description: Mantra Towers of Chevron Surfers Paradise
offer_address: 23 Ferny Ave, Surfers Paradise QLD 4217, Australia

title: Fun-Filled Gold Coast Escape at Australia's Best Family Resort with Daily Breakfast & Unlimited Water Park Access
description:
Treat your family to the ultimate getaway at this award-winning resort, a paradise of fun featuring an ice-skating rink, Kids' Club and a thrilling three-storey water park packed with slides, water cannons and climbing frames.

Voted Australia's Best Family Resort for 12 consecutive years by Holidays with Kids magazine, this action-packed destination - just minutes away from Surfers Paradise's spectacular beaches - makes for the ultimate family adventure. And you'll be all set to savour it, with daily breakfast for two adults and two children included in your escape, plus unlimited access to Kidz Zone Waterpark, one Kids' Club session per child, a 50% discount when purchasing additional Kids' Club sessions and more.

Relax in an upgraded Captain's Superior Resort Room, conveniently located near the water park, and enjoy endless family fun with a variety of activities, live entertainment and premium facilities, like a jungle gym and climbing wall. This resort, known as 'heaven for kids, paradise for parents,' lets the little ones explore while you unwind.

Dive into the outdoor heated lagoon and sip on poolside daiquiris, enjoy hassle-free daily housekeeping and satisfy even the pickiest eaters with a variety of onsite dining options.
offer_address: 122 Ferny Avenue, Surfers Paradise, Queensland 4217, Australia

title: Surfers Paradise Hilton Two-Bedroom Luxury Residences with Ocean Views, Daily Breakfast & A$150 Dining Credit
description:
Live out your five-star dreams at Hilton Surfers Paradise Hotel & Residences, the elegant jewel in the Gold Coast's shimmering crown. Enjoy all the perks of a luxury hotel whilst feeling at home in your modern two-bedroom oasis, with enough room for the whole family. A mere block from one of Queensland’s most famous stretches of sand, the stylish resort puts the Sunshine State at your fingertips, with gourmet dining, boutiques and lively bars just seconds away. Enjoy a bountiful breakfast at Catch and make use of your dining credit at the ultra-glamorous Ms Margot’s or The Deck Bar.

Breathtaking views form the backdrop to every part of your stay, from your spacious private balcony to The Deck Bar or splashing around in one of the four pools - take in the gorgeous hinterland, the vibrant city and the Gold Coast's signature sand beaches. Two fitness centres and the blissful eforea spa are the cherries on top, making for an incredibly indulgent escape. Whether you're travelling with friends or family, explore the glimmering Gold Coast and seize the chance to recharge in splendour.
offer_address: 6 Orchid Avenue, Surfers Paradise 4217, Queensland, Australia

title: Five-Star Luxury with Ocean Views at the Hilton Surfers Paradise
description: Explore Queensland's most famous beach town staying at the five-star Hilton Surfers Paradise on the Gold Coast. title: Surfers Paradise Self-Contained Apartment Stay Moments from the Beach with Two Pools & Tennis Courts
description:
Hang ten at this stylish apartment stay, located just 25 metres from the golden sands and first-class waves of Surfer’s Paradise Beach. Backed by showstopping views over the Pacific Ocean, you’ll be all set to discover the city’s best, with Pacific Fair and The Star Gold Coast both easily accessible via the nearby G:link tram.

After a day exploring the city's iconic sights, return to the comfort of your self-contained apartment and feel the calming sea breeze from your sun-kissed private balcony. Cool off at one of the hotel's two outdoor pools, the perfect place to laze away the afternoon, have a hit at the onsite tennis courts or cook up a storm in the fully equipped barbecue area.
offer_address: 2 Thornton Street, Surfers Paradise, Queensland, Australia, 4217

title: Family-Friendly Surfers Paradise Fun with Waterpark & Ice-Skating Rink
description: Unlock core memories with the entire family with an escape to Paradise Resort, where countless family-friendly adventures await. With a tropical-themed water park, ice-skating rink, supervised kids' club, pamper parlour and adventure playground, there is something new to try everyday. Venture outside the award-winning resort to discover even more attractions: iconic Surfers Paradise beach is just metres away.
offer_address: 122 Ferny Avenue, Surfers Paradise, Queensland 4217, Australia

title: Contemporary Surfers Paradise Escape near Iconic Beach
description: Moments from Surfers Paradise's golden beachfront, the sophisticated Crowne Plaza Surfers Paradise, an IHG Hotel, sits between the iconic strip and lively Broadbeach. Wake up to the sound of the ocean, plunge into the sparkling outdoor pool and enjoy a bite of the Gold Coast at the poolside Relish Grill & Bar, then visit your favourite movie characters at Warner Bros. Movie World - just a 30-minute drive - or get a dose of retail therapy at Pacific Fair Shopping Centre, within a 10-minute tram ride.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Surfers Paradise, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 2807 Gold Coast Hwy, Surfers Paradise QLD 4217

title: Relaxed Central Surfers Paradise Break near Cavill Avenue with Three Pools
description: Moments from Surfers Paradise's waves and golden sand, revel in sun-kissed days with an escape near the lively Cavill Avenue bursting with cafes, bars and shopping. Start your days with a bite at Koastal Kitchen, splash around in one of three pools (one with waterslides) or practice your serve at the onsite tennis courts. If that's not enough to keep you entertained, kick up the action at Warner Bros Movie World or Sea World, only a short drive away.
offer_address: 3400 Gold Coast Highway, Surfers Paradise, Queensland 4217, Australia

title: Central Gold Coast Self-Contained Apartment Escape Steps from Surfers Paradise Beach
description:
Live the Gold Coast dream at Mantra Wings Surfers Paradise - your laidback launchpad between the ocean and the action. Just a stone's throw away from the iconic Surfers Paradise Beach, this tropical retreat blends beachside bliss with high-rise comfort. Wake to ocean breezes on your private balcony, stroll to the golden sands, or unwind with a dip in the lagoon-style pool.

You’re just minutes from Cavill Avenue’s electric buzz - think boutique shopping, rooftop bars and foodie hotspots. When it’s time to level up the thrills, theme parks like Dreamworld and Wet’n’Wild are an easy drive away.
offer_address: 18 Fern Street, Surfers Paradise, Queensland 4217, Australia

vendor_name: voco Gold Coast, an IHG Hotel
title: Stylish Surfers Paradise Escape near Cavill Avenue with Two Pools
description: Sparkling azure waters, pristine white sand and trendy beachfront restaurants await at the modern voco™ Gold Coast. Steps away from the golden shores of Surfers Paradise Beach and the unmissable shopping of Cavill Avenue, this contemporary hotel is the perfect place to soak up the Gold Coast sun. Catch a wave at some of Australia’s best beaches or spend the day exploring the diverse culinary offerings around the hotel, before heading back to your contemporary accommodation for a dip in one of the two pools. Dig into juicy steaks at Clifford's Grill & Lounge or pamper yourself with an indulgent massage at the luxurious L’Aqua Day Spa. At night, kick back on your plush bedding, take in the stunning views and enjoy a restful sleep to prepare for more days of sun, surf and sand.
offer_address: 31 Hamilton Avenue, Surfers Paradise QLD 4217 Australia

title: Stylish Novotel Surfers Paradise Escape with Pool Moments from Cavill Avenue
description: Experience the epitome of Gold Coast sophistication and take in impressive views from all angles at this Surfers Paradise oasis. This high-rise hotel puts the sand and sunshine on your doorstep, with the beach just metres away and the lively atmosphere of Cavill Avenue within easy reach. Exceptional facilities, including a gleaming pool, jet-powered spa and tennis courts, and the onsite BLVD Cafe & Bar are sure to impress. To round out your day, fire up the hotel's BBQ facilities for an alfresco family-friendly feast.
offer_address: Corner Of Surfers Paradise Blvd, Hanlan Street, Surfers Paradise, Queensland 4217, Australia

title: Contemporary Surfers Paradise Self-Contained Apartments with Four Pools, BBQ Facilities & Tennis Court
description:
Lose yourself in golden moments with a central apartment stay just moments away from the world-class waves of Surfers Paradise Beach and lively Cavill Avenue’s world-class dining and nightlife. There's plenty to keep the whole crew entertained with this fun-filled Gold Coast escape:  splash around four swimming pools, practice your swing on the tennis court and enjoy alfresco dining on balmy evenings at the BBQ area. 

Each self-contained apartment features fully equipped kitchens and plenty of space for the family or groups of friends, making it the perfect launchpad for your Gold Coast getaway. For more fast-paced action, drive 30 minutes to Warner Bros. Movie World or shop until you drop at Pacific Fair Shopping Centre, only 10 minutes away.
offer_address: Cnr Clifford St & The Esplanade, Surfers Paradise QLD 4217, Australia

title: Spacious Surfers Paradise Self-Contained Apartments Metres from the Beach with Two Pools
description:
Enjoy a home away from home in the sparkling Gold Coast with a stay at this collection of stylish apartments, perfectly positioned in the heart of Surfers Paradise. Built above the Paradise Centre shopping complex, retail therapy and the the golden sands of the beach are just moments from your doorstep. Plus the vibrant dining options and eclectic mix of boutiques along Cavill Avenue are also nearby. 

Each one-, two- or three-bedroom apartment offers stunning ocean views, a fully-equipped kitchen and spacious living areas. Onsite, relax as you please with two outdoor swimming pools, tennis courts, and a spa and sauna.
offer_address: 3 Hanlan St, Surfers Paradise, Queensland, Australia, 4217

title: Central Surfers Paradise Apartment Escape near Cavill Avenue with Outdoor Pool, BBQ Facilities & Rooftop Sundeck
description:
Seek laidback, beachside bliss with this convenient Gold Coast stay, located mere minutes from the waves of Surfers Paradise Beach. Wake up to hinterland or ocean views from your self-contained apartment, then take a dip in the heated pool to start your day. As the evening falls, head to the rooftop sundeck for enviable sunset views or cook up a storm at the hotel's barbecue facilities.

Experience the best of the Gold Coast from your central abode, moments from Cavill Avenue and perfectly located for delving into the area’s world-class surf breaks, twilight markets and lively nightlife. Just moments away, discover gourmet dining and iconic attractions including Sea World and the SkyPoint Observation Deck.
offer_address: 3142 Surfers Paradise Boulevard, Surfers Paradise, Queensland 4217 Australia

title: Family-Friendly Self-Contained Apartments Opposite Surfers Paradise Beach with Three Pools
description:
Experience the vibrancy of Surfers Paradise from the comfort of this modern apart-hotel, where space comes at no premium and convenience is king. Perfectly positioned opposite the golden sands of Surfers Paradise Beach, BreakFree Moroccan Surfers Paradise offers large self-contained apartments with private balconies boasting breathtaking ocean views.

Enjoy a dip in one of the three pools, relax in the sauna or keep your fitness regime going in the gym. Explore the nearby Cavill Avenue for shopping, dining and entertainment, or venture further to the Gold Coast Hinterland for a day of adventure with the whole family.
offer_address: 14 View Avenue, Surfers Paradise, Queensland, 4217, Australia

title: Beachfront Surfers Paradise Self-Contained Apartments with Two Pools & Tennis Court
description:
Experience the laidback coastal charm of Queensland's Gold Coast with a self-contained apartment stay boasting fresh sea breezes and spectacular views. Perfect for families and groups, this idyllic stay is situated mere moments from the powder-soft sands and blue waters of Surfers Paradise, as well as the nearby Cavill Avenue shopping, dining and entertainment precinct.

Positioned in the heart of Surfers Paradise, wander down to shops, restaurants and nightlife, or relax on the beach across the road at the patrolled swimming zone. For those looking to stay closer to home, resort amenities include two pools, a tennis court, a sauna and barbecue facilities.
offer_address: Cnr Staghorn Avenue and The Esplanade, Surfers Paradise, Queensland, 4217, Australia

vendor_name: Mantra Circle on Cavill Surfers Paradise
title: Stylish Surfers Paradise Apartment Stay with Private Cinema, Three Pools & Shopping Centre Access
description: Elevate your Gold Coast stay and discover the perfect home-away-from-home at the Mantra Circle on Cavill Surfers Paradise. Offering apartment-style living and boasting top-notch facilities including a private cinema, three swimming pools, a spa, and direct access to some of the area's best shopping, you'll be in an ideal location to explore  Surfers Paradise. Should you venture out, you'll find an array of tantalising eateries, gorgeous sandy beaches and activities for the whole family just a stone's throw away.
location_description: Mantra Circle on Cavill Surfers Paradise
offer_address: 9 Ferny Avenue, Surfers Paradise, Queensland, 4217, Australia
